name: Bored Room (naxvader)
description:
This game was made in #AulaArcadeGameJam5 by three people. We were:

Alberto Navarro Gordillo - Programmer.
Francisco Javier Sánchez-Mellado Engo - Illustrator.
Ignacio Pérez Mateo - Game Designer.

Controls:
Use the mouse to aim and left click button to shoot.
